pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rail Trail Data for Trails in the United States from the Rails- to-Trails // Rail trail data from the excellent 'TrailLink' website, sponsored by the Rails-to-Trails Conservancy https://www.traillink.com/. Includes information (such as name, length, surface, and reviews) about nearly 11,628 trails and 72,512 reviews in every state in the United States. Data can be used to better understand recreational trail use in the United States.
